PrecisApproval of the request made by the Chairman of the Pension Appeals Board to the HONOURABLE LORNE O. CLARKE and the HONOURABLE E. PATRICK HARTT, former judges, to act as temporary members of the Canada Pension Plan Pension Appeals Board.
